block:
SnowleoSDR Source zingsdr_source_sync ZINGSDR import zingsdr zingsdr.source_sync($ipaddr, $port, $rx_freq, $rx_vga, $rx_lan, $sample_rate, $dci, $dcq)
set_dc_offset($dci, $dcq) set_freq($rx_freq) set_gain($rx_vga) set_sample_rate($sample_rate)
IP Address ipaddr 192.168.1.10 string
Port port 5005 int
RX Freq rx_freq 1500000000 real
RX GAIN rx_vga 0 int
RX LAN rx_lan 0 int
Sample Rate sample_rate 10000000 real
DC I dci 130 int
DC Q dcq 148 int
40000000 >= $sample_rate > $sample_rate >= 400000 > 3700000000 >= $rx_freq > $rx_freq >= 380000000 > 20 >= $rx_vga > $rx_vga >= 0 >
out complex MAX_OUT
